mapper.select: SELECT ft.tdftSort ,th.tdthBranch FROM infrMember mm JOIN tradFavoriteTheater ft on ft.infrMember_ifmmSeq = mm.ifmmSeq JOIN tradTheater th on th.tdthSeq = ft.tradTheater_tdthSeq WHERE 1=1 and mm.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}

SELECT mv.tdmvSeq ,mv.tdmvMovieTitle ,(select tdthBranch from tradTheater th where th.tdthSeq = tt.tradTheater_tdthSeq) as tdthBranch ,(select tdpxPlexName from tradTheaterPlex px where px.tdpxSeq = tt.tradTheaterPlex_tdpxSeq) as tdpxPlexName ,tt.tdttShowTime ,bk.tdbkBookingDate FROM infrMember mm JOIN tradBooking bk on mm.ifmmSeq = bk.infrMember_ifmmSeq JOIN tradBookingSeat bs on bs.tradBooking_tdbkSeq = bk.tdbkSeq JOIN tradTimeTable tt on tt.tdttSeq = bk.tradTimeTable_tdttSeq JOIN tradMovie mv on mv.tdmvSeq = tt.tradMovie_tdmvSeq WHERE 1=1 AND mm.ifmmSeq = #{ifmmSeq}
